description: Detects cases in which a file gets renamed to .dll, which often happens to bypass perimeter protection
name: Rename Common File to DLL File
query: (file.path:*.dll AND (NOT ((OriginalFilename:(*.dll OR *.tmp) OR OriginalFilename:(*.dll.* OR *\\SquirrelTemp\\temp*)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* AND process.executable:*\\TiWorker.exe))))
author: frack113
